TEXT.TITLE: SAVIN <SVB> IN PACT WITH SUN CHEMICAL <SNLA>
TEXT.BODY: Savin Corp said it has reached an agreement for Sun Chemical Corp to study the potential of Savin infrared technology for possible use in classified U.S. military applications. It said a royalty-bearing license could result. Reuter
